name: ADMG World- The Journey(Alpha)
description: This is  a test product I made as a class assignment. I hope those that garner interest understand that this  is still an alpha I did't have much time as I have college work to do but  I was able to scrounge some time to create this sort of alpha its not a finished product but still a playable one. I am still an amature at rpg maker but I will stride to finish and release this game whenever I can . Now for the contents it is a heavy story based linear quest  rpg game. when I get a chance there will be more world building a lot more lore and I will try to create a more believable world. If you wish to support me that is an option I am a college student and can't make any promises. But during the winter break I will be working on it a lot if I get the chance.
